text: Mariem Hassan (; 1958 â€“ 22 August 2015), was a Sahrawi singer and lyricist from Western Sahara. She usually sang in Hassaniyya, an Arabic dialect spoken mostly in Western Sahara and Mauritania. Hassan died of bone cancer in a Sahrawi refugee camp in Tindouf, Algeria on 22 August 2015. ==Other websites== * Bio of Mariem Hassan on her label website * Mariem Hassan MySpace * Bio of Mariem Hassan Category:1958 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Singers
title: Mariem Hassan
